Rule Notes: Complete the University General Education Requirements for Quantitative Reasoning A (QR-A) and Quantitative Reasoning B (QR-B) coursework.
Constraints / Details: BA math requirement is satisfied via the Gen Ed QR-A and QR-B designations (no separate credit minimum listed here).
Either: (1) complete the fourth unit of a language other than English; OR (2) complete the third unit of a language AND the second unit of an additional language other than English.

Rule Notes: Complete L&S breadth distribution across Humanities, Social Science, and Natural Science.
Constraints / Details: Humanities: 12 credits (must include 6 credits of literature). Social Science: 12 credits. Natural Science: 12 credits (must include one 3+ credit Biological Science course and one 3+ credit Physical Science course).

Rule Notes: Complete at least 108 credits of Liberal Arts and Science coursework.
Complete at least 60 credits at the intermediate or advanced level.
Declare and complete at least one major.

Constraints / Details: Complete both: (1) 30 credits in residence overall; and (2) 30 credits in residence after the 86th credit.

Rule Notes: Meet minimum GPA requirements at UW–Madison.
Constraints / Details: Earn at least 2.000 GPA in (1) all coursework at UW–Madison; and (2) intermediate/advanced level coursework at UW–Madison.
